data.title: Video Game Reviews from the Top Critics in Gaming
data.meta_description: The top critics in gaming. All in one place. OpenCritic is a review aggregator for video games, collecting reviews from the top publications in gaming such as IGN, GameSpot, Polygon, and Eurogamer.
data.text:
2024 Hall of Fame

The best games of 2024 (so far)

syndicated

Valve Patent Hints at Big Upgrade for Steam Deck

A recent patent by Valve indicates the Steam Deck handheld console is getting some changes that could be a major upgrade for the hardware.

from Game Rant (Written by Trumann Tu) | August 11, 2024

Read More

syndicated

Unannounced Valve Game Already Has Over 10,000 Players

A new unannounced game from Valve looks to be ramping up testing ahead of its reveal, with the unconfirmed game already showing 10,000 players.

from Game Rant (Written by Michael Brandon Ingram) | August 11, 2024

Read More

syndicated

Fortnite's Big Disney Crossover Is Still "A Few Years Away"

The Incredibles and various Disney villains might be coming this Fall, but we're still a few years from the main event.

from TheGamer (Written by George Foster) | August 11, 2024

Read More

syndicated

All Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 Campaign Cutscenes Have Leaked Online

All Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 campaign cutscenes have already leaked online two and a half months ahead of the game's release.

from Game Rant (Written by Dominik Bo≈°njak) | August 11, 2024

Read More

syndicated

Genshin Impact Leak Reveals Free Character for Update 5.0

A new Genshin Impact leak reveals that players will be able to get a free copy of a popular four-star character in the upcoming version 5.0.

from Game Rant (Written by Hajrudin Krdzic) | August 11, 2024

Read More

syndicated

Zenless Zone Zero Leak Reveals Changes to Qingyi

A recent Zenless Zone Zero leak reveals several balance changes coming to Qingyi, a brand-new agent who will debut in version 1.1.

from Game Rant (Written by Berat Ozkan) | August 11, 2024

Read More

syndicated

Zenless Zone Zero Reveals New Character Caesar King

Zenless Zone Zero reveals the first new character for its next version update, and she's Caesar King from the Sons of Calydon.

from Game Rant (Written by Jackie Arias) | August 11, 2024

Read More

syndicated

Baldur's Gate 3 Originally Had A Bhaalspawn Companion

Before The Dark Urge was written, Larian considered adding a Bhaalpawn companion to Baldur's Gate 3.

from TheGamer (Written by Rhiannon Bevan) | August 11, 2024

Read More

syndicated

Fortnite Reveals New Absolute Doom Marvel Collaboration

Epic Games and Marvel confirms the newest Fortnite season as Absolute Doom bringing new cosmetics and content to the game very soon.

from Game Rant (Written by Derek Nichols) | August 11, 2024

Read More
